alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Rusk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Marion, Harrison, northeastern Rusk and Gregg Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 531 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Liberty City to Kilgore to 6 miles northeast of Joinerville. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Longview, Marshall, Kilgore, White Oak, Hallsville, Jefferson, Tatum, Clarksville City, Liberty City, Woodlawn, Berea, Harleton, Lakeport, Easton, Scottsville, Nesbitt, Rolling Meadows, Monroe, Darco and Stewart. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
